Created by \n\nJaeseok Huh\nAdrian Steffan
Meet Cancel
Found you
Hey there! My name is Cupee. I will guide your through a typical interaction with Cupeer! Cupeer enables you to find nearby people to socialize with, all without requiring an internet connection. Press the discover button to start discovering nearby users!
Great, you discovered me! Next, we will both play this little personality quiz. I bet we will be a great match!
In the next screen, you can compare your answers to the ones you partner gave. After checking them you out, you can decide if want to meet this person (or me, in this case).
hmm, interesting! Unfortunately I am not a real person (yet) :/ Otherwise we could use this chat to find each other and meet up! To end the chat after meeting the other person, use the button at the top. Thank you for using Cupeer!
